OCC.DAT:
#Comment ---------------------------------------------- #Comment start_of_references #ifdefined TEMPLATENAME #info symbol TEMPLATENAME is already or also defined as a global or local constant #endif #define TEMPLATENAME= #Comment

public web variables string JSONrecords string fieldlist string vItemId string vItemValue string lcItem string vIndex numeric totalOcc struct customerStruct endvariables
clear retrieve "CUSTOMER" setocc "CUSTOMER",1 totalOcc = $hits("CUSTOMER")
putitem/id $webinfo("httpresponseheaders"),"Access-Control-Allow-Origin","http://localhost" putitem/id $webinfo("httpresponseheaders"),"Allow-Origin","http://localhost"
putitem/id $webinfo("httpresponseheaders"),"Content-Type", "text/html;charset=utf-8" ; putitem/id $webinfo("httpresponseheaders"),"Content-Type", "application/json;charset=utf-8"
componentToStruct
#define DQ %%"%%%
JSONrecords= " [ "
forentity "CUSTOMER.PAPERROUTE" ;loop through each CUSTOMER row JSONrecords = "%%JSONrecords { " putlistitems/occ fieldlist, "CUSTOMER.PAPERROUTE"
forlist/id vItemId, vItemValue, vIndex in fieldlist lcItem = $lowercase(vItemId,"classic") if ($number(vItemValue) = 0) JSONrecords = "%%JSONrecords <DQ>%%lcItem<DQ> : <DQ>%%vItemValue<DQ>" else JSONrecords = "%%JSONrecords <DQ>%%lcItem<DQ> : %%vItemValue" endif if (vIndex < $itemcount(fieldlist) ) JSONrecords = "%%JSONrecords, " endif
endfor JSONrecords = "%%JSONrecords }" if ($curocc("CUSTOMER") < totalOcc) JSONrecords = "%%JSONrecords, " endif endfor
JSONrecords= "%%JSONrecords ]" $webinfo("OUTPUT") = JSONrecords return(0)
store if ($status <0) message $text(1500) ;error rollback else if ($status = 1) message $text(1723) ;no change else commit if ($status < 0) rollback else message $text(1805) ;OK endif endif endif
erase if ($status <0) message $text(1763) ;error rollback else if ($status = 1) message $text(1634) ;not allowed else message $text(1806) ;OK commit endif endif
#include U:zProcError ; Report an unexpected failure in a proc statement.

#comment The pre-defined constant $cmpStateManagedBy represents the component property 'State Managed By'. #comment See GetState and SetState triggers for usage. #comment It has one of the following values:
#define noState = 0 #define byCookie = 1 #define byStateManagerComponent = 2

#Comment ---------------------------------------------- #Comment start_of_references #ifdefined TEMPLATENAME #info symbol TEMPLATENAME is already or also defined as a global or local constant #endif #define TEMPLATENAME= #Comment
#Comment end_of_references
#Comment ---------------------------------------------- #Comment start_of_mappings #Comment end_of_mappings
#Comment ---------------------------------------------- #Comment start_of_symbols #Comment end_of_symbols
#Comment ----------------------------------------------

#ifdefined frmEntity ; Generated three tier component: Delegate clear() to FRM Subtype. ; This allows a uniform implementation that can be invoked ; by other objects too (for example, by a 'Clear' Button). $collhandle("<frmEntity>")->clear()
#else clear
#endif

#ifdefined frmEntity ; Generated three tier component: Delegate load() to FRM Subtype. ; This allows a uniform implementation that can be invoked ; by other objects too (for example, by a 'Load' Button). $collhandle("<frmEntity>")->load()
#else retrieve if ($status < 0) message $text(1762) ;error endif
#endif

#ifdefined frmEntity ; Generated three tier component: Delegate load() to FRM Subtype. ; This allows a uniform implementation that can be invoked ; by other objects too (for example, by a 'Load' Button). $collhandle("<frmEntity>")->load()
#else retrieve if ($status < 0) message $text(1762) ;error endif
#endif

#ifdefined frmEntity ; Generated three tier component: Delegate save() to FRM Subtype. ; This allows a uniform implementation that can be invoked ; by other objects too (for example, by a 'Save' Button). $collhandle("<frmEntity>")->save()
#else store if ($status < 0) message $text(1500) ; error rollback else if ($status = 1) message $text(1723) ; no change else commit if ($status < 0) rollback else message $text(1805) ; Ok endif endif endif
#endif

#ifdefined frmEntity ; Generated three tier component: Delegate deleteall() to FRM Subtype. ; This allows a uniform implementation that can be invoked ; by other objects too (for example, by a 'Delete All' Button). $collhandle("<frmEntity>")->deleteall()
#else erase if ($status < 0) message $text(1763) ;error rollback else if ($status = 1) message $text(1634) ;not allowed else message $text(1806) ;Ok commit endif endif
#endif

#ifdefined frmEntity ; Generated three tier component: Delegate save() to FRM Subtype. ; This allows a uniform implementation that can be invoked ; by other objects too (for example, by an 'OK' Button). if ($formmod) $collhandle("<frmEntity>")->save() ; save modifications if ($status < 0) ; check negative status from Save() return (-1) endif endif
exit (0) #else #endif
#include U:zProcError ; Report an unexpected failure in a proc statement.

#Comment ---------------------------------------------- #Define FRMNAM=UUXTXT41 #Define FRMLIB=UUXTXT41 #Define FRMTYP=40 #Define FRMPRE=UU #Define FRMCLS=00 #Define FRMGRP=CONC #Define FRMWKB=CONC #Define FRMPRM= #Define FRMFPF= #Define FRMSEQ=XREF_TYPE.SELECTION, XREFNAME.SELECTION, XREFENT.SELECTION, XREFMDL.SELECTION, CNTXT_TYPE.SELECTION, CNTXTNAME.SELECTION, CNTXTENT.SELECTION, CNTXTMDL.SELECTION, XREF_TYPE.SELECTION
#Define OBJECTS= #Define COMPONENTS=
#Define OBJNAM0= #Define OBJABR0= #Define OBJTYP0= #Define OBJNEW0= #Define OBJDEL0= #Define OBJPKF0= #Define OBJPRM0= #Define OBJFLD0= #Define OBJCMP0=
#Define CMPNAM0= #Define CMPTYP0= #Define CMPLAY0= #Define CMPMNT0= #Define CMPFPF0= #Define CMPOBJ0= #Define CMPDES0= #Define CMPPAR0= #Define CMPBAR0= #Define CMPCPP0= #Define CMPCPC0_1=
#Define INCLUDE_ACPT=0 #Define INCLUDE_AIO=0 #Define INCLUDE_CLR=0 #Define INCLUDE_DECR=0 #Define INCLUDE_DELE=0 #Define INCLUDE_DFMT=0 #Define INCLUDE_DLUP=0 #Define INCLUDE_DTLE=0 #Define INCLUDE_DTLF=0 #Define INCLUDE_ENCR=0 #Define INCLUDE_ERAS=0 #Define INCLUDE_EXEC=0 #Define INCLUDE_FMT=0 #Define INCLUDE_GFOC=0 #Define INCLUDE_HLPE=0 #Define INCLUDE_HLPF=0 #Define INCLUDE_LFLD=0 #Define INCLUDE_LMK=0 #Define INCLUDE_LMO=0 #Define INCLUDE_LOCK=0 #Define INCLUDE_LPME=0 #Define INCLUDE_LPMF=0 #Define INCLUDE_LPMX=0 #Define INCLUDE_LPO=0 #Define INCLUDE_MNUE=0 #Define INCLUDE_MNUF=0 #Define INCLUDE_MNUS=0 #Define INCLUDE_NFLD=1 #Define INCLUDE_OBA=0 #Define INCLUDE_PFLD=1 #Define INCLUDE_PRNT=0 #Define INCLUDE_PULS=0 #Define INCLUDE_QUIT=0 #Define INCLUDE_READ=0 #Define INCLUDE_RETR=0 #Define INCLUDE_RMO=0 #Define INCLUDE_SMOD=0 #Define INCLUDE_STOR=0 #Define INCLUDE_UKYS=0 #Define INCLUDE_VCHG=0 #Define INCLUDE_WRIT=0 #Define INCLUDE_WRUP=0

public web
variables string urlpresented string type string qualifier string item string subitem string debugstring string requestmethod, server_variables, sentparameters string accept, content_type, output_type, uppercasecontent string url numeric vStatus endvariables
urlpresented = $webinfo("PATHINPUT")
; ; No complete path specified so return a 204 ;
getitem/id server_variables, $webinfo("WEBSERVERCONTEXT"), "SERVERVARIABLES" getitem/id requestmethod, server_variables, "REQUEST_METHOD"
vStatus = $split($item("SERVER_PROTOCOL", server_variables), 1, "/", url, "") url = $concat($concat($lowercase(url), "://", $item("SERVER_NAME", server_variables), ":", $item("SERVER_PORT", server_variables)), $item("REQUEST_URI", server_variables))
getitem/id accept, $webinfo("HTTPREQUESTHEADERS"), "accept" getitem/id content_type, $webinfo("HTTPREQUESTHEADERS"), "content-type"
getitem/id sentparameters, $webinfo("INPUT"), "format"
output_type = "JSON" if ($uppercase(sentparameters) = "XML" | $scan($uppercase(accept), "XML") > 0) output_type = "XML" endif
if (requestmethod = "OPTIONS") $webinfo("status") = "200" putitem/id $webinfo("httpresponseheaders"),"Allow","GET,HEAD,OPTIONS" $webinfo("output") = "Allow: GET, HEAD, OPTIONS"; return (0) endif
if ($length(urlpresented) = 0) $webinfo("status")="204" $webinfo("output") = "%%$outputprefix$ 204 No Data Present" return (0) endif
; ; Method other than GET/HEAD specified ; if (requestmethod != "GET" && requestmethod != "HEAD") $webinfo("status") = "405" return (0) endif
getitem type, urlpresented, 1 getitem qualifier, urlpresented, 2 getitem item, urlpresented, 3 getitem subitem, urlpresented, 4
selectcase type case "globalprocs" $webinfo("status") = globalprocs( qualifier, item, url, output_type, requestmethod) case "models" $webinfo("status") = models( qualifier, item, subitem, url, output_type, requestmethod) case "xref" $webinfo("status") = xref (qualifier, url, output_type, requestmethod) elsecase $webinfo("status") = "404" ; Return Not Found endselectcase
return 0

; ********************************************************************************
entry globalprocs
params string library_name : IN ; The library string proc_name : IN ; The proc string url : IN ; The URL string content_type : IN ; XML or JSON string request_method : IN ; HEAD or GET endparams
variables string JSONrecords numeric totalOcc string outputFieldList endvariables
#define EntName=USOURCE
clear/e "<EntName>" USUB.<EntName>/init = "P" UVAR.<EntName>/init = $uppercase(library_name)
if ($length(proc_name) > 0) ULABEL.<EntName>/init = $uppercase(proc_name) endif
retrieve/e "<EntName>"
if (library_name = "") outputFieldList = "uvar=Library&uSEP;uri" sort "<EntName>", $concat($idpart($itemnr(1, outputFieldList)), ": u") elseif (proc_name = "") outputFieldList = "ulabel=Object&uSEP;uvar=Library&uSEP;uri" else outputFieldList = "ulabel=Object&uSEP;uvar=Library&uSEP;utext=Text" endif
setocc "<EntName>",1
if (request_method = "HEAD") JSONRecords = "OK" $webinfo("OUTPUT") = $concat( $OUTPUTPREFIX$, JSONrecords) if ($hits("USOURCE") > 0) return (200) else return (404) endif endif
totalOcc = $hits("<EntName>")
if ($hits("<EntName>") = 0 | $hits("<EntName>") = "" ) JSONRecords = "Not found" return (404) endif
;$webinfo("OUTPUT") = $concat( $OUTPUTPREFIX$, JSONrecords) ;return (0)
putitem/id $webinfo("httpresponseheaders"),"Access-Control-Allow-Origin","http://localhost" putitem/id $webinfo("httpresponseheaders"),"Allow-Origin","http://localhost"
;putitem/id $webinfo("httpresponseheaders"),"Content-Type", "application/json"
if (content_type = "XML") putitem/id $webinfo("httpresponseheaders"),"Content-Type", "text/xml" ; removed charset= else putitem/id $webinfo("httpresponseheaders"),"Content-Type", "text/json" ; removed charset= endif
JSONrecords = generateOutput("<EntName>", outputFieldList, url, content_type)
;$webinfo("OUTPUT") = $concat( $OUTPUTPREFIX$, JSONrecords) $webinfo("OUTPUT") = JSONrecords return(200)
end;- globalprocs
; ********************************************************************************
entry models
params string model_name : IN ; The model string entity_name : IN ; The entity string field_name : IN ; The field string url : IN ; The URL string content_type : IN ; XML or JSON string request_method : IN ; HEAD or GET endparams
variables string JSONrecords numeric totalOcc string outputFieldList endvariables
#define EntName=UCFIELD
clear/e "<EntName>" U_VLAB.<EntName>/init = $uppercase(model_name)
if ($length(entity_name) > 0) U_TLAB.<EntName>/init = $uppercase(entity_name) if ($length(field_name) > 0) U_FLAB.<EntName>/init = $uppercase(field_name) endif endif
retrieve/e "<EntName>"
if (model_name = "") outputFieldList = "u_vlab=Model&uSEP;uri" sort "<EntName>", $concat($idpart($itemnr(1, outputFieldList)), ": u") elseif (entity_name = "") outputFieldList = "u_tlab=Entity&uSEP;u_vlab=Model&uSEP;uri" sort "<EntName>", $concat($idpart($itemnr(1, outputFieldList)), ": u") elseif (field_name = "") outputFieldList = "u_flab=Field&uSEP;u_tlab=Entity&uSEP;u_vlab=Model&uSEP;uri" else outputFieldList = "u_flab=Field&uSEP;u_tlab=Entity&uSEP;u_vlab=Model&uSEP;u_fseq=Sequenc Number&uSEP;u_dtyp=Data Type" endif
setocc "<EntName>",1
if (request_method = "HEAD") JSONRecords = "OK" $webinfo("OUTPUT") = $concat( $OUTPUTPREFIX$, JSONrecords) if ($hits("<EntName>") > 0) return (200) else return (404) endif endif
totalOcc = $hits("<EntName>")
if ($hits("<EntName>") = 0 | $hits("<EntName>") = "" ) JSONRecords = "Not found" return (404) endif
;$webinfo("OUTPUT") = $concat( $OUTPUTPREFIX$, JSONrecords) ;return (0)
putitem/id $webinfo("httpresponseheaders"),"Access-Control-Allow-Origin","http://localhost" putitem/id $webinfo("httpresponseheaders"),"Allow-Origin","http://localhost"
;putitem/id $webinfo("httpresponseheaders"),"Content-Type", "application/json"
if (content_type = "XML") putitem/id $webinfo("httpresponseheaders"),"Content-Type", "text/xml" ; removed charset= else putitem/id $webinfo("httpresponseheaders"),"Content-Type", "text/json" ; removed charset= endif
JSONrecords = generateOutput("<EntName>", outputFieldList, url, content_type)
;$webinfo("OUTPUT") = $concat( $OUTPUTPREFIX$, JSONrecords) $webinfo("OUTPUT") = JSONrecords return(200)
end;- models
; ********************************************************************************
entry xref params string referencename : IN string url : IN string content_type : IN string request_method : IN endparams
variables string JSONrecords numeric totalOcc string outputFieldList endvariables
; ================================================== ; Load FLISTs $FRMOBJ$ = $text("FLIST_RR_GEN") ; General texts $TRIGGER$ = $text("FLIST_RR_UGCROSS") ; Trigger abbreviations ; ==================================================
$CONTEXT$ = "" $PREV_CONTEXT$ = ""
; Fill dropdownlists in Profile section: ; ; Reference ; ; CPT=Component,APS=Startup Shell,FRM=Form,VAR=Global Variables,PRC=Global Proc module,KTT=Translation_table,PNL=Panel,MSG=Message Text, ; GLY=Glyph,MEN=Menu,FIL=File,INC=Include,LIB=Library,PRO=Proc,ENT=Entity,CNT=Counter,DTD=Document Type Definitions,TEM=Template,FLD=Field, ; HND=Handle,$V$=Component Variable,$NN=General Variable,EIN=Entity Interface,FIN=Field Interface,FSY=Field Syntax,FLA=Field Layout,PER=Perform,PAT=Path ; $reference_types$ = $item("VALREP", $ude("Describe", "Symboltable&uSEP;TYP")) ; Modify texts... putitem/id $reference_types$, "PRC", "Global Proc" putitem/id $reference_types$, "KTT", "Keyboard Table" putitem/id $reference_types$, "$V$", "Comp. Variable" putitem/id $reference_types$, "DTD", "DTD" ; ; Compiled Object ; ; CPT=Component,APS=Startup Shell,PRC=Central Proc module,PNL=Panel,MSG=Message Text,MEN=Menu $object_types$ = $item("VALREP", $ude("Describe", "Symboltable&uSEP;OBJTYP")) ; Modify texts... putitem/id $object_types$, "PRC", "Global Proc"
outputFieldList = "d_reftyp=Type&uSEP;d_refname=Name&uSEP;d_objnam=ReferencedBy&uSEP;d_objtyp=ObjectType&uSEP;uobjnam=Object&uSEP;d_trigger=Trigger&uSEP;udefsln=LineNo&uSEP;trg_var=TriggerVar"
clear UOBJNAM/init = referencename retrieve "UXCROSS" setocc "UXCROSS",1
if (request_method = "HEAD") JSONRecords = "OK" $webinfo("OUTPUT") = $concat( $OUTPUTPREFIX$, JSONrecords) if ($hits("UXCROSS") > 0) return (200) else return (404) endif endif
totalOcc = $hits("UXCROSS")
putitem/id $webinfo("httpresponseheaders"),"Access-Control-Allow-Origin","http://localhost" putitem/id $webinfo("httpresponseheaders"),"Allow-Origin","http://localhost"
;putitem/id $webinfo("httpresponseheaders"),"Content-Type", "application/json"
if (content_type = "XML") putitem/id $webinfo("httpresponseheaders"),"Content-Type", "text/xml" ; removed charset= else putitem/id $webinfo("httpresponseheaders"),"Content-Type", "text/json" ; removed charset= endif
JSONrecords = generateOutput("UXCROSS", outputFieldList, url, content_type)
;$webinfo("OUTPUT") = $concat( $OUTPUTPREFIX$, JSONrecords) $webinfo("OUTPUT") = JSONrecords return(200)
end;- xref
; ********************************************************************************
entry generateOutput
returns string
params string EntityName : IN string outputFieldList : IN string url : IN string content_type : IN endparams
variables struct vStruct string JSONrecords string fieldlist string vItemId string vItemValue string lcItem string vIndex numeric totalOcc string sTemp string processedFieldList string vFieldName string vOutput string vUri endvariables
if (content_type = "XML") vStruct->root = $newstruct else vStruct = $newstruct endif
forentity EntityName ;loop through each USource Reference row
if (content_type = "XML") vStruct->root->row{-1} = $newstruct else vStruct->""{-1} = $newstruct endif
putlistitems/occ fieldlist, EntityName
processedFieldList = "" forlist/id vItemId, vItemValue, vIndex in fieldlist getitem/id vFieldName, outputFieldList, vItemId if (vFieldName != "") putitem/id processedFieldList, vFieldName, vItemValue endif endfor if ($lowercase($itemnr(-1, outputFieldList)) = "uri") putitem/id processedFieldList, "uri", $concat(url, "/", $lowercase($valuepart($itemnr(1, processedFieldList)))) endif
forlist/id vItemId, vItemValue, vIndex in processedFieldList lcItem = $lowercase(vItemId,"classic")
if (content_type = "XML") vStruct->root->row{-1}->"%%lcItem" = vItemValue else vStruct->""{-1}->"%%lcItem" = vItemValue endif endfor
endfor
if (content_type = "XML") structtoxml vOutput, vStruct else structtojson vOutput, vStruct endif
return (vOutput)
end;- generateOutput
; ********************************************************************************

<!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta name="Default" content="Uniface 9" /> <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="../css/udsp.css" /> <title>title</title> </head> <body>
page content here
</body> </html>

; -- start extended triggers for grid widget
trigger ColumnHeader_LClicked params string fieldName : in numeric shiftKey : in endparams
end ; trigger ColumnHeader_LClicked
trigger RowHeader_LClicked params numeric rowNumber : in numeric shiftKey : in endparams
end ; trigger RowHeader_LClicked
trigger CornerButton_LClicked params numeric shiftKey : in endparams
end ; trigger CornerButton_LClicked
trigger VScrollBar_HitEnd
end ; trigger VScrollBar_HitEnd
trigger Viewport_Resized params numeric widthPx : in numeric heightPx : in string columnWidthsPx : in endparams
end ; trigger Viewport_Resized
trigger Column_Resized params string columnName : in numeric viewportWidthPx : in string columnWidthsPx : in endparams
end ; trigger Column_Resized
; -- end triggers for grid widget

;; call RR_header()
; ========================================================= ; Set CONTEXT-Field in pageheader ; ========================================================= ;if ($page = 1) ; CONTEXT.HEADER = "" ; Skip context on profile page ;else ; if ($CONTEXT$ != "") ; if ($CONTEXT$ = $PREV_CONTEXT$) ; getitem/id $1, $FRMOBJ$, "CONT" ; Add text 'continued' ; CONTEXT.HEADER = "%%$CONTEXT$%%% %%$1%%%" ; else ; CONTEXT.HEADER = $CONTEXT$ ; endif ; endif ;endif

variables string sTemp endvariables
read ; occurrence of UXCROSS if ($status = 0) ; read successful
; Compiled Object name is shown in UOBJNAM.UXCROSS ; Additional info on compiled object is shown in D_OBJNAM.UXCROSS ; getitem/id D_OBJTYP.UXCROSS, $object_types$, UOBJTYP.UXCROSS if ($status = 0) D_OBJTYP.UXCROSS = UOBJTYP.UXCROSS if ($$UU_SPECIAL = 1) putmess "Missing object type for %%UOBJNAM.UXCROSS%%%." endif ; selectcase UOBJTYP.UXCROSS case "CPT" if (UDEFFLD.UXCROSS != "" & UDEFFLD.UXCROSS != "0") D_OBJNAM.UXCROSS = UDEFFLD.UXCROSS if (UDEFENT.UXCROSS != "" & UDEFENT.UXCROSS != "0") D_OBJNAM.UXCROSS = "%%D_OBJNAM.UXCROSS%%%.%%UDEFENT.UXCROSS%%%" if (UDEFMDL.UXCROSS != "" & UDEFMDL.UXCROSS != "0") D_OBJNAM.UXCROSS = "%%D_OBJNAM.UXCROSS%%%.%%UDEFMDL.UXCROSS%%%" elseif (UDEFENT.UXCROSS != "" & UDEFENT.UXCROSS != "0") D_OBJNAM.UXCROSS = UDEFENT.UXCROSS if (UDEFMDL.UXCROSS != "" & UDEFMDL.UXCROSS != "0") D_OBJNAM.UXCROSS = "%%D_OBJNAM.UXCROSS%%%.%%UDEFMDL.UXCROSS%%%" endif case "APS" ; case "PRC" D_OBJNAM.UXCROSS = UOBJLIB.UXCROSS case "PNL" D_OBJNAM.UXCROSS = UOBJLIB.UXCROSS case "MSG" ; not supported case "MEN" D_OBJNAM.UXCROSS = "%%UOBJLIB.UXCROSS%%%.%%UOBJLAN.UXCROSS%%%" if (UDEFSRC.UXCROSS != "" & UDEFSRC.UXCROSS != "0") if (D_OBJNAM.UXCROSS = "") D_OBJNAM.UXCROSS = "%%UDEFSRC.UXCROSS%%%" else D_OBJNAM.UXCROSS = "%%D_OBJNAM.UXCROSS%%%.%%UDEFSRC.UXCROSS%%%" endif endif elsecase if ($$UU_SPECIAL = 1) putmess "Unknown compiled object type: %%UOBJTYP.UXCROSS%%%." endselectcase
; Entry or Operation name (UDEFMOD) in <OPER> or <LPMX>. ; c=Global,m=Entry,o=Operation;t=Trigger if (UDEFMID.UXCROSS != "0") getitem/id sTemp, $item("VALREP", $ude("Describe", "Symboltable&uSEP;MID")), UDEFMID.UXCROSS if ($status > 0 & UDEFMID.UXCROSS != "c") if (D_OBJNAM.UXCROSS = "") D_OBJNAM.UXCROSS = "%%sTemp%%% %%UDEFMOD.UXCROSS%%%" else D_OBJNAM.UXCROSS = "%%D_OBJNAM.UXCROSS%%%, %%sTemp%%% %%UDEFMOD.UXCROSS%%%" endif endif endif
; Source ID: Include Proc/Global Proc ; I=Include Proc,P=Global Proc if (UDEFSID.UXCROSS != "0") getitem/id sTemp, $item("VALREP", $ude("Describe", "Symboltable&uSEP;SID")), UDEFSID.UXCROSS if ($status > 0) if (D_OBJNAM.UXCROSS = "") D_OBJNAM.UXCROSS = "%%sTemp%%% %%UDEFSRC.UXCROSS%%%" else D_OBJNAM.UXCROSS = "%%D_OBJNAM.UXCROSS%%%, %%sTemp%%% %%UDEFSRC.UXCROSS%%%" endif endif endif
; Trigger long name if (UDEFTRG.UXCROSS != "0") getitem/id D_TRIGGER.UXCROSS, $text("FLIST_RR_CO_TRIG"), UDEFTRG.UXCROSS if ($status = 0) ; Not found: try the $describe list getitem/id D_TRIGGER.UXCROSS, $item("VALREP", $ude("Describe", "Symboltable&uSEP;TRG")), UDEFTRG.UXCROSS if ($status = 0) if ($$UU_SPECIAL = 1) putmess "Unknown trigger abbreviation: %%UDEFTRG.UXCROSS%%%." endif endif else D_TRIGGER.UXCROSS = "(No trigger)" endif
; Trigger source line number if (UDEFSLN.UXCROSS = "0") UDEFSLN.UXCROSS = ""
; Trigger variation ; T=Template,M=Model,C=Component if (UDEFTRF.UXCROSS = "T") TRG_VAR.UXCROSS = "Template" elseif (UDEFTRF.UXCROSS = "M") TRG_VAR.UXCROSS = "Model" elseif (UDEFTRF.UXCROSS = "C") TRG_VAR.UXCROSS = "Component" else TRG_VAR.UXCROSS = "" endif
; Reference object ; getitem/id D_REFTYP.UXCROSS, $reference_types$, UREFTYP.UXCROSS if ($status = 0) D_REFTYP.UXCROSS = UREFTYP.UXCROSS if ($$UU_SPECIAL = 1 & UREFTYP.UXCROSS != "") putmess "Missing reference type for %%UREFTYP.UXCROSS%%%." if ($$UU_SPECIAL = 1 & UREFTYP.UXCROSS = "") putmess "Reference type not filled in for %%UOBJNAM.UXCROSS%%%." endif ; selectcase UREFTYP.UXCROSS case "VAR" D_REFNAME.UXCROSS = "%%UREFENT.UXCROSS%%%:%%UREFFLD.UXCROSS%%%" case "PRC" D_REFNAME.UXCROSS = "%%UREFENT.UXCROSS%%%:%%UREFFLD.UXCROSS%%%" case "INC" D_REFNAME.UXCROSS = "%%UREFENT.UXCROSS%%%:%%UREFFLD.UXCROSS%%%" elsecase if (UREFFLD.UXCROSS != "") D_REFNAME.UXCROSS = UREFFLD.UXCROSS if (UREFENT.UXCROSS != "") if (D_REFNAME.UXCROSS = "") D_REFNAME.UXCROSS = "%%UREFENT.UXCROSS%%%" else D_REFNAME.UXCROSS = "%%D_REFNAME.UXCROSS%%%.%%UREFENT.UXCROSS%%%" endif endif if (UREFMDL.UXCROSS != "") if (D_REFNAME.UXCROSS = "") D_REFNAME.UXCROSS = "%%UREFMDL.UXCROSS%%%" else D_REFNAME.UXCROSS = "%%D_REFNAME.UXCROSS%%%.%%UREFMDL.UXCROSS%%%" endif endif endselectcase
; Calltype ; D=Declaration,A=Activate,N=NewInstance,R=RunForm,B=Attribute,O=Operation,I=Instance getitem/id sTemp, $item("VALREP", $ude("Describe", "Symboltable&uSEP;CALLTYPE")), UREFCLT.UXCROSS if ($status > 0) D_REFNAME.UXCROSS = "%%D_REFNAME.UXCROSS%%% (%%sTemp%%%)" endif
return (0)
endif

; Page 1 = profile. ; Page 2 = first page of references with occurrence header labels printed. ; Page 3 = break frame prints header labels. ; $PREV_PAGE$ = $PAGE$ $PAGE$ = $page if (($PAGE$ > $PREV_PAGE$) & ($page > 2)) printbreak "PRINTLABELS" endif

; -- start triggers for picture widget
trigger moveTo params string dragvalue: in string dropformat: in string itemvalue: in numeric numberofobjects: in numeric index: in endparams
end ; trigger moveTo
trigger moveFrom params string dragvalue: in string dropformat: in numeric numberofobjects: in numeric index: in endparams
end ; trigger moveFrom
trigger moveWithin params string dragvalue: in string dropformat: in string itemvalue: in numeric numberofobjects: in numeric index: in endparams
end ; trigger moveWithin
trigger copyTo params string dragvalue: in string dropformat: in string itemvalue: in numeric numberofobjects: in numeric index: in endparams
end ; trigger copyTo
trigger createShortcutTo params string dragvalue: in string dropformat: in string itemvalue: in numeric numberofobjects: in numeric index: in endparams
end ; trigger createShortcutTo
; -- end triggers for picture widget
Appended first to OUTPUT data chanel
